sources.title: Rainbow Valley
sources.description: John Martin (John Wayne) is a government agent working under cover. Leading citizen Morgan calls in gunman Butch Galt (Buffalo Bill Jr.) who blows Martin's cover.

sources.title: Rainbow Valley (1935) John Wayne - Action, Romance, Western
sources.description:
John Martin is a government agent working under cover. Leading citizen Morgan calls in gunman Galt who blows Martin's cover.

Director: Robert N. Bradbury 
Writers: Lindsley Parsons, Lindsley Parsons 
Stars: John Wayne, Lucile Browne, George 'Gabby' Hayes 
Genres: Action, Romance, Western

metadata.Plot: Rainbow Valley needs a new road and newcomer John Martin agrees to build it. Rogers is out to stop it and alters the town's petition to the Governor thereby obtaining the release of his boss Butch Galt. John and Butch were cell mates in prison. So Butch gets John to agree to wreck the road and furnishes him with dynamite. But dynamite is just what John needs to finish the work and he hopes to take care of Butch's gang at the same time.
metadata.Actors: John Wayne, Lucile Browne, George 'Gabby' Hayes
